rows.label: qst104217_msg0001
rows.name: Heheheh... The power of science, mo!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0002
rows.name:
Are friends interested in
Kyukyu's research, mo?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0003
rows.name:
Kyukyu crushes, mixes, and
burns ores and herbs to
experiment on their reactions, mo.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0004
rows.name:
Take large amount of intelligence.
Must measure smallest change in
quantities or procedure.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0005
rows.name:
Kyukyu believes that someday, Kyukyu will
be able to create something shiny gold or
a medicine that cures anything, mo.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0006
rows.name:
Kyukyu used to be in Acedia,
but Kyukyu's lab, tools, and
money are all gone, mo.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0007
rows.name:
Kyukyu has no choice but to
continue research here, but...

rows.label: qst104217_msg0008
rows.name:
Kyukyu doesn't have enough research
funds, mo... Kyukyu wants to do
research inside a building, mo...

rows.label: qst104217_msg0009
rows.name:
Kyukyu wants a job that uses Kyukyu's
knowledge and skills to earn money
and continue research, mo...

rows.label: qst104217_msg0010
rows.name:
Are friends looking for a
teacher in Iyasaki Village, mo?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0011
rows.name:
If it's okay to do it on the side of
research, Kyukyu can do it, but are
friends really okay with Kyukyu, mo?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0051
rows.name: Invite Kyukyu to be a teacher?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0052
rows.name: Invite

rows.label: qst104217_msg0053
rows.name: Think it over

rows.label: qst104217_msg0061
rows.name: Kyukyu accepts, mo.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0062
rows.name:
Kyukyu doesn't have much
luggage, so getting ready
will be quick, but...

rows.label: qst104217_msg0063
rows.name:
...Kyukyu has no money, so Kyukyu
will take a slow journey on cheap
Divine Beast ships, mo.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0081
rows.name:
If friends change their mind,
please let Kyukyu know, mo.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0101
rows.name: Heheheh... The power of science, mo!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0102
rows.name:
Is this an invitation to be a teacher,
mo? Kyukyu would be half-researcher,
half- teacher, is that alright, mo?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0151
rows.name: Heheheh... The power of science, mo!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0152
rows.name:
Kyukyu has run out of money to
buy materials to burn... Kyukyu
has no choice but to work, mo...

rows.label: qst104217_msg201
rows.name:
Kyukyu crushes, mixes, and
burns ores and herbs to
experiment on their reactions, mo.
